txt.en: Encounters appear randomly throughout each Skirmish and many have conditions which must be met for them to appear. Completing all the encounters within a skirmish will increment a deed with unique rewards. Encounter monsters will drop consumables you can use to help aid you in your battle. These items will provide a short term benefit to you and your allies and must be used before the skirmish is complete.
